title: Noble Intentions (1C304)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Exert a companion (except a Hobbit) to make a Hobbit strength +3.
Lore:	”'You carry the fate of us all, little one …. If this is indeed the will of the Council, then Gondor will see it done.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Version: +.
